mapper.select: select * from announcement_tb order by created_at desc limit #{offset}, #{recordSize}
mapper.insert: insert into announcement_tb(classification, title, content, file, created_at) values(#{classification}, #{title}, #{content}, #{file}, now())
mapper.update: update announcement_tb set title = #{title}, classification = #{classification}, content = #{content}, file = #{file} where id = #{id}
